resources.string:
This app periodically samples the following data, for each CPU core: Relative user and idle utilisation values, Absolute frequency, Relative frequency.

Below, you can configure the storage location for the log files. It will be either the application folder on the internal storage, or on an external SD card.

Once started, the application will run a background service, which will continue running if this configuration interface is closed. A persistent notification will be created, which can be used to open this view, or stop the service.
Phone state permissions are needed to uniquely identify the device. Otherwise, a per-session UUID will be created.
External storage write permissions are needed if the application is supposed to write to folders other than the app data folder.
